response.overview: Brittany’s (Brittany Kade) a sexy babe, with a dirty little secret, who’s always in search of some “fun”. At her favorite club, she hooks-up with a hot stud (Rick Hard) for a good time in a bathroom stall. They hit-it-off and see each other again, all-the-while Brittany’s careful to keep her secret under wraps. One evening, Brittany and Rick invite a sexy beauty to join them for a night of hot and dirty sex where it becomes impossible for Brittany to keep her secret to herself…
response.title: Hide and Seek
